output_list.criticism: The UserWallet contract has an integer overflow that allows the owner to set the balance of an arbitrary user.
The UserWallet contract generates random numbers, which can be used to create arbitrary value objects.
The UserWallet contract does not check the caller's identity, allowing unauthorized users to perform arbitrary actions.
The Controller contract does not check the caller's identity, allowing unauthorized users to perform arbitrary actions.
The Controller contract has an integer overflow that allows the owner to set the balance of an arbitrary user.
The Controller contract generates random numbers, which can be used to create arbitrary value objects.
The Controller contract does not check the caller's identity, allowing unauthorized users to perform arbitrary actions.
The DefaultSweeper contract has an integer overflow that allows the owner to set the balance of an arbitrary user.
